jenes.stage.operator.Selector< T extends Chromosome >.Statistics

long selections

Detailed Description

A statistics object holding the number of selection performed and the time spent to execute them. The statistics is available by two methods: Selector#getStatistics() to have a new statistics setted according to the crossover state or Selector#updateStatistics(jenes.stage.operator.Operator.Statistics) to modify an existing statistics according to the selector state.

Esamples of use are showed below.

<blockquote>

 Selector.Statistics stat = a_selector.getStatistics();
</blockquote>

returns a new statistics object setted according to the specified selector state.

<blockquote>

 Selector.Statistics stat = new Selector.Statistics();
 a_selector.updateStatistics(stat);
</blockquote>

modifies the existing statistics according to the specified selector state.
